comments.author: Ive Gone Parabolic
comments.body: Granted that this coin survives it will be worth 1/billionth of a cent and this is your best case scenario. I am just stressing that you should abandon it before you even started. You need to land on the rock hard surface of the reality and bear in your skull that crypto public no longer follows this forum for their investment choices. It just beats me how people do not realize making new coins no longer makes sense.

comments.author: tippytoes
comments.body: Quote from: Ive Gone Parabolic on August 01, 2022, 07:12:19 PMGranted that this coin survives it will be worth 1/billionth of a cent and this is your best case scenario. I am just stressing that you should abandon it before you even started. You need to land on the rock hard surface of the reality and bear in your skull that crypto public no longer follows this forum for their investment choices. It just beats me how people do not realize making new coins no longer makes sense.If you will look at their site, it seems to me as experimental project of a 3rd grader. I may be exaggerating here, but don't know if people are still falling from this kind of project. A doge clone under BSC network, now, who will support this? More than likely, those who are only after for quick gain, but wonder who will buy, unless the team themselves showing that someone is buying this token. I think, better abandon this project this early. Before they will screw up naive users.

comments.author: Ruslan007
comments.body: If you create this coin by mining then people will see it and they will create it on BSC with that name and promote it. By the time of entering the exchange, you will have to change the name

comments.author: Ruslan007
comments.body: The probability is 99%, in September-October, the smart contract will be updated. There will be a new address. Holders will receive new coins in their wallets. There will be no less money in the liquidity pool than before the update. The update is necessary to protect the smart contract from hacker attacks.

comments.body: The audit must be postponed until November

comments.author: Ruslan007
comments.body: https://github.com/cyberscope-io/audits/blob/main/dogamg/audit.pdf Towards the end of December I will try to do KYC. For those who do not understand, this means that the founder of the project undergoes KYC in an audit company via video conference, where questions will be asked. Why is this necessary? This will give future fans of the project a guarantee that there are no anonymous people behind the project. Also, in case of fraud on the part of the project, the audit company unilaterally posts this video in the public domain.

comments.author: Ruslan007
comments.body: KYC is almost completed, but I don’t think they will complete it today.Happy New Year 2024 to all fans of the project and haters. I wish everyone health and lots of smiles next year.
